name: Taupe Overcheck Trousers
describe: Strut your stuff in style - this slim fit cream checked trouser is a dapper addition to any wardrobe, with a rebellious, trendy feel practically woven into its fabric, with a style taupe overcheck. Effortlessly sharp, this ivory checked suit trouser features a flat fronted design, side pockets and a trademark slim fit, in a soft, cream colour scheme that's ideal for summer. A classic suit by Antique Rogue, inspired by a rock and roll attitude and a more rebellious feel for menswear.

comments.review: Ordered 17.5 inch white shirt, received 14 inch neck blue shirt. Perfect, thanks!

Great quality and great fit. Comes with buttons attached so no need for cufflinks.
